{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = NanoPi NEO2-1.jpg |image1_size = 200px |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_NEO2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi NEO |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 (512MB) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 26 December 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/NanoPi_NEO2_(512MB) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H5; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 816 <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E;RTL8211E-VB-CG; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 02:01:E4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.03;; |stockos = Linux;4.11.0;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = Micro USB
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, GPIO, UART, SPI, I2C, I2S, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2017 |estprice = 15 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0728LPB2R |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 (Quad-core Cortex-A53) @816MHz *GPU: ''Mali-450MP4'' @600MHz (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Memory: 512MB/1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_NEO2 ''NanoPi NEO2'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_NEO2 ''FriendlyARM NanoPi NEO2'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/03/14/nanopi-neo2-development-bord-powered-by-allwinner-h5-64-bit-arm-processor-sells-for-15/ ''NanoPi NEO2 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/friendlyarm/friendlyarm_nanopi_neo2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa53 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
